flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Wire cutter/stripper
Tools
  • Soldering Iron and rosin core solder.

lines.text: This will allow you to clean it off when you get a lot of burnt solder on it
lines.text_raw: This will allow you to clean it off when you get a lot of burnt solder on it

lines.text: This will just help you, well, melt the solder
lines.text_raw: This will just help you, well, melt the solder

lines.text: I cannot stress how important it is to clean the iron, or it will corrode and be useless, clean it up!
lines.text_raw: I cannot stress how important it is to clean the iron, or it will corrode and be useless, clean it up!

lines.text: This is where you put solder on the iron for better heat flow and a cleaner tip
lines.text_raw: This is where you put solder on the iron for better heat flow and a cleaner tip

lines.text: Put the wires together or parts in the board, and solder the two together
lines.text_raw: Put the wires together or parts in the board, and solder the two together

lines.text: This will allow for the next step to be easier
lines.text_raw: This will allow for the next step to be easier

lines.text: This is the fun part. But be careful, the flame is hot and you can burn yourself!
lines.text_raw: This is the fun part. But be careful, the flame is hot and you can burn yourself!

lines.text: This will keep it from burning itself out.
lines.text_raw: This will keep it from burning itself out.

guide.summary: This guide will show you how to use a soldering iron.
guide.title: Soldering Iron

tools.text: Soldering Iron and rosin core solder.
